wf_activity.name: Cloud Services to Manually Create Job Status Record

sys_variable_value.value: task.work_notes = 'Manually create a Cloud Services Job Status record so that the workflow can recover. Included Job ID, all Child Job IDs (comma seperated, no spaces), Requested Item RITM Number, and Status. If job is complete in CloudCenter, then set Status to Deployed, otherwise set it to Starting.';
CloudCenter did not return Job and Child Job IDs
